No Poverty.reason: Focuses on individual career development and increasing self-value, which can indirectly lead to economic improvement and poverty reduction.

Quality Education.reason: As an educational course, it fundamentally aims to "enhance industry knowledge," "develop skills," and "prepare for career," directly contributing to quality education.

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: The course aims to "increase your value," "prepare for career," and understand "business models" and "social responsibility," directly fostering decent work and economic growth.

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: The course introduces "various industries," their "operations," "business models," and fosters "innovative thinking," directly relating to industry and innovation.

Reduced Inequalities.reason: Focuses on individual career development and industry knowledge, which can indirectly contribute to economic opportunities, but does not explicitly address reducing inequalities.

Responsible Consumption and Production.reason: Explicitly addresses "sustainability considerations of business situations" and covers "supply chain" and "business models," relevant to responsible consumption and production.

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: Addresses "ethics, social responsibility" in business, and covers "auditing" and "risks," which are foundational to good governance and strong institutions.

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: Mentions "upstream/midstream/downstream cooperation models," "teamwork skills," and an "international perspective," reflecting principles of partnership.
